description: Creates a new cross-cluster search connection from a source Amazon OpenSearch Service domain to a destination domain. For more information, see Cross-cluster search for Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: LocalDomainInfo
parameters.description: Name and Region of the source (local) domain. AWSDomainInformation (dict) --- Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain. OwnerId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner. Name of the domain. Region (string) --- The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

nested_params.name: AWSDomainInformation
nested_params.description: Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

nested_params.name: OwnerId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

parameters.name: RemoteDomainInfo
parameters.description: Name and Region of the destination (remote) domain. AWSDomainInformation (dict) --- Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain. OwnerId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner. Name of the domain. Region (string) --- The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

nested_params.name: AWSDomainInformation
nested_params.description: Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

nested_params.name: OwnerId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

parameters.name: ConnectionProperties
parameters.description: The ConnectionProperties for the outbound connection. Endpoint (string) --- The endpoint of the remote domain. Applicable for VPC_ENDPOINT connection mode. CrossClusterSearch (dict) --- The connection properties for cross cluster search. SkipUnavailable (string) --- The status of the SkipUnavailable setting for the outbound connection. This feature allows you to specify some clusters as optional and ensure that your cross-cluster queries return partial results despite failures on one or more remote clusters.

nested_params.name: Endpoint
nested_params.description: The endpoint of the remote domain. Applicable for VPC_ENDPOINT connection mode.

nested_params.name: CrossClusterSearch
nested_params.description: The connection properties for cross cluster search.

nested_params.name: SkipUnavailable
nested_params.description: The status of the SkipUnavailable setting for the outbound connection. This feature allows you to specify some clusters as optional and ensure that your cross-cluster queries return partial results despite failures on one or more remote clusters.

nested_items.name: LocalDomainInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the source (local) domain.

nested_items.name: Region

nested_items.description: Name of the domain.

nested_items.name: ConnectionAlias
nested_items.description: Name of the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the connection.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The status code for the outbound connection. Can be one of the following:

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Verbose information for the outbound connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the created outbound connection, which is used for subsequent operations on the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionMode
nested_items.description: The connection mode.

nested_items.name: ConnectionProperties
nested_items.description: The ConnectionProperties for the newly created connection.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the remote domain. Applicable for VPC_ENDPOINT connection mode.

nested_items.name: CrossClusterSearch
nested_items.description: The connection properties for cross cluster search.

nested_items.name: SkipUnavailable
nested_items.description: The status of the SkipUnavailable setting for the outbound connection. This feature allows you to specify some clusters as optional and ensure that your cross-cluster queries return partial results despite failures on one or more remote clusters.
